definition: to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to

sentences.english: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 在一只大的不粘锅中高火加热一大汤匙油。

sentences.english: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 取一只大号不粘锅，用中高火加热2汤匙油。

sentences.english: Wait with iron easy corrode what the metal makes not to stick boiler , cannot make acidity provision.
sentences.chinese: 用铁等易腐蚀金属制造的不粘锅，不能制作酸性食品。

sentences.english: Add the egg mixture to a preheated non-stick pan.
sentences.chinese: 将混入这些食材的蛋液倒入已经预热的不粘锅。

sentences.english: Heat 3 tablespoons canola oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat.
sentences.chinese: 中火加热一只大号长柄不粘锅，放入油。

sentences.english: Oil the griddle with butter, or spray it with non-stick cooking spray.
sentences.chinese: 用黄油涂一下锅底，或者用不粘锅的喷油。

sentences.english: You are on the lookout for a new cookware set.
sentences.chinese: 你留意寻找一个新的不粘锅定。
用不粘锅烹饪试的喷雾。

sentences.english: It prevents food from sticking and works best when used with a nonstick pan.
sentences.chinese: 植物油和不粘锅一起使用效果会更好。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
